Promo Video for ChinesePod Tablet App

07 Mar 2012


In January I wrote about ChinesePod tablet application, which I developed. ChinesePod host John Pasden and his dog demonstrate how to use app's main features. By the way, the version, which is in the video does not yet have search implemented. But if you download the latest version now, you can search lessons from Library easily.

One of the coolest features of the app is avatar uploading, which took time for me to create. Check the video below at 1:56 to see my face :) I became famous now :D

Promo video:


Introducing the ChinesePod Android Tablet App from ChinesePod on Vimeo.

In 2012, a momentous moment transpired: ChinesePod released their first ever Android tablet app, ushering a new era in which the tablet (and Google TV) will become an exciting and valuable new tool for learning Chinese.

Will the world ever be the same? We sincerely doubt it....
